structure.unit: Executive And Administrative Officers Of The Commonwealth

text.section: to ensure that adequate and well-maintained public facilities exist to support the commonwealth’s fishing, marine, tourist, and recreational industry in the coastal zone;

to provide flexible and affordable financial programs for the commonwealth’s coastal cities and towns so that they can plan for, construct, reconstruct, maintain and improve public coastal facilities;
to improve planning for coastal facilities consistent with the policies of the executive office of environmental affairs;
to encourage greater cost sharing between the public and users of public facilities financed with public funds.
